EventActionChangeValue.SourceDataDefinition: IF([SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX:1] == [LOCAL:TEMP VIEW INDEX], ([SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX:1] + [SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX MAX:2] + 1) % [SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX MAX:2], [SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX:1])

IF([SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX:1] == [LOCAL:TEMP VIEW INDEX], ([SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX:1] + [SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX MAX:2] - 1) % [SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX MAX:2], [SIMCONNECT:CAMERA VIEW TYPE AND INDEX:1])
